resources.string: Are the perfect blinds for creating a modern and uncluttered look in your home. the versatility of Venetians makes the simple to use.
Synthetic blinds are ideal for high humidity, extreme temperatures and direct sunlight.

The perfect solution for sliding doors and large windows. Simplicity of use. Sleek and elegant. Panel sizes range from 450mm to 1200mm. Both side and center opening available. Available in most bamboo and roller fabrics.

Percolate your light with simple fabric roller blinds that are neat, functional, practical and low maintenance. Fabric and patterned roller blinds provide an uncluttered windows treatment that is more economical than curtains.
Fabric vertical blinds provide a decorative and effective method in which to control light while still maintaining a perfect view from your home or office.
The shade’s built-in insulating characteristics help keep the heat out in summer and the warmth in during winter. Highly versatile, Duette blinds are soft,durable, and highly energy efficient.

Double roller blinds are two blinds enclosed together in a neat cassette system. The blinds are controlled separately to customise your widow light. These blinds are ideal for light filtering, shading and also for total sun block.

Double roller blinds are two blinds enclosed together in a neat cassette system. The blinds are controlled separately to customise your widow light. These blinds are ideal for light filtering, shading and also for total sun block.
The ideal way to cover a door or window and allows protection from sun and rain.
Patio shade awnings are suspended on trolleys which run on tracks attached to the beams of a Pergola which folds away neatly.
Folding arm awnings serve to extend your living space. They enhance the exterior of your home.
Aluminium louvred awnings have louvre panels that can be opened and closed to suit all types of weather, giving you extended outdoor living all year round.
A Synthetic product manufactured from a combination of timber fibres and glue and is dimensionally very stable. it is extruded in conjuction with a polypropene coating to give a smooth, even finish.
Classed as hardwood and is naturally a medium density timber giving a good resistance to knocks and bumps. Cl
Classed as hardwood and is naturally a medium density timber giving a good resistance to knocks and bumps.Cl

Excellent alternative to enhance your home with as an external feature, offer protect from corrosion harsh environments and at the same time solar and wind protection. This product and also serve and a partial security solution.

Made using a timber core and is encased in a synthetic product called ABS (Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene) and is useful for moisture areas. AS this is a type of plastic, it is not susceptible to any movement as timber can be. Warping is not an issue.
To enhance your driveway giving protection to your vehicles- boats and caravans from direct sunlight and rain.
